If # altcoin dropped from $15 to $10 since May 1 it is probably down because # BTC is down & BTC/USD exchange rate got cut by 33%. Not necessarily because the altcoin was sold and/or because something changed w/ that altcoin. You must look at # bitcoin exch rate & $ US rate & Volume.

# bitcoin dropped 35% since May 1. If you have old open limit orders to sell # altcoins set in $ BTC ... what you thought you were going to fill/exit w/ a gain in $ US terms may now be in the red. If you feel your names are worth the same adjust limits higher in BTC terms by 25%-50%.
